name: r1
description: A man was taking a walk and it started to rain. He did not bring an umbrella or wear a hat. All of his clothes got wet but not a single hair got wet. How is this possible?

name: r3
description: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?

name: r4
description: What has a head, a tail, is brown, and has no legs?

name: r5
description: How can you make seven even?

name: r6
description: What comes once in a minute, twice in a moment, but never in a thousand years?

name: r7
description: David's father has three sons : Snap, Crackle and _____ ?

name: r9
description: When does Christmas come before Thanksgiving?

name: r10
description: What 7 letter word is spelled the same way backwards and forewords?

name: r11
description: I am full of holes but I can still hold water. What am I?

name: r12
description: They have not flesh, nor feathers, nor scales, nor bone. Yet they have fingers and thumbs of their own. What are they?

name: r13
description: What is more useful when it is broken?

name: r14
description: Before Mount Everest was discovered, what was the highest mountain on Earth?

name: r15
description: This is as light as a feather, yet no man can hold it for long. What am I?
